overview:
Jonathan Marchbank joined us in April 2011, as Chief Executive Officer. He is now building our global team and accelerating investment into the functionality and features of our services.

Prior to joining Dealised, Jonathan worked for the Virgin Group in the US, Singapore and Australia. Most recently, Jonathan had been Chief Operating Officer for Virgin Mobile USA based in New Jersey serving over 5 million mobile customers. He was responsible for all operational activities of the Company, including Sales, Marketing, Product Management & Technology. Prior to that Jonathan was CEO for Virgin Mobile in Asia and in Australia. Jonathan has also held senior executive roles with Nokia, Philips Electronics and Telstra Corporation. He graduated with a diploma in business studies, majoring in marketing from Newcastle Business School in UK, where he currently serves on the NBS advisory Board.
